content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Factory at position(x=-52.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (x=61.0, y=-52.0) 
- Furnace at position (x=63.0, y=-52.0) 
- Furnace at position (x=65.0, y=-52.0) 

### Copper Plate Mine at position(x=-28.5, y=-61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is not full before attempting to insert items. Check the furnace's status and available capacity.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to ingredient availability in furnaces
- Verify that the required ingredients are available in the inventory before trying to smelt items in the furnace.
